        Specified by:
        getValue in interface VariableManager
        Returns:
        the variable If this has enclosed some other VariableManager, this method shall return the local variable if found, otherwise, return the variable from higher level.

      • tryGetValue

        public CTValue tryGetValue​(java.lang.String name)
        Specified by:
        tryGetValue in interface VariableManager
        Returns:
        the variable is it is already defined, otherwise. If this has enclosed some other VariableManager, this method shall return the local variable if found, otherwise, return the variable from higher level.
